A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Pros:
- Great visuals\, sound effects\, creative environments
- overall entertaining production

Cons:
- Does not live up to the buildup in Force Awakens
- Poor/questionable plot
- Poor use of valuable time with the original Star Wars cast
- Did not emulate enough nostalgia for the classic Star Wars vibe (felt like it was directed and written by someone who doesnt understand what made Star Wars such a success story). If you want to make a new take on Star Wars\, dont call it Star Wars.
- one on one lightsaber battles: none
- questionable abrupt deaths/non-deaths: plenty.
